meanings.sent1: After playing outside, he sweated a lot.
meanings.sent2: She sweated during her intense workout.
meanings.sent3: The sun was so hot that even the ice cream sweated!
meanings.sent4: The walls of the gym sweated with the effort of the athletes.
meanings.sent5: The nervous speaker sweated profusely under the bright lights.

meanings.sent1: The spicy food really sweated him.
meanings.sent2: The coach's training session sweated the players.
meanings.sent3: The sauna sweated out all the toxins from his body.
meanings.sent4: The intense workout sweated the stress away.
meanings.sent5: The hot weather sweated the hikers as they climbed the mountain.

meanings.sent1: She was a sweated worker, always giving her best.
meanings.sent2: The sweated laborers finished the project ahead of schedule.

meanings.sent1: The dehumidifier sweated the dampness from the room.
meanings.sent2: The intense heat sweated the moisture from the clothes.
meanings.sent3: The desert sweated the water from his skin quickly.
meanings.sent4: The salt sweated from the seawater as it evaporated.
meanings.sent5: The heat of the fire sweated the sap from the wood.

meanings.definition: subjected to a process of sweating
